level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among states enacting similar legislation.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-105 substituted "this chapter" for "this act" in two places.
D.C. Law 15-354 substituted "this chapter" for "this subchapter".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 15-901.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 14 of the Uniform Foreign-Money Claims Act.
